Lounge.description:
You find yourself in the new adventurers lounge.  Where are the new adventurers
   come to find themeselves.  There seem to be some books on the shelf with
 knowledge of the realm.  There is a hallway leading [south] into a main
 hall and a chair where you can [sit] and read the books.  To read books
 [look] and [exam] one of your choice.  If you know all
 there is to know, feel free to head to down the hall.
